name: Ravelry - Bring Back the Yarn!
description:
A lot of people are really missing the ball of yarn that is so iconic of Ravelry. This particular theme works in sync with my other theme Ravelry - Return to Subtle Greens.

For instructions on getting started with using Userstyle Themes and to get the main theme please check this page.
https://userstyles.org/styles/185312/ravelry-return-to-subtle-greens

user.name: Evanita Montalvo
user.about: I can be reached via Ravelry PM via username EWM.

additional_info:
RETIRED
